items.title: 11 Dividend Increases Expected In February 2025
items.description: February 2025 will see 11 expected dividend increases from companies with a history of consistent annual dividend hikes. Read more to see a full review.

items.title: PepsiCo, Cisco Among 19 Companies To Announce Dividend Increases In First Half Of February
items.description: Get ready for a busy February with 19 dividend increase announcements expected, including 10%+ increases from Sherwin-Williams and Genuine Parts Co. Click to read.
